ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذْتُمُ ٱلْعِجْلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمْ ظَٰلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa brought you the Clear Signs; then, after he left, you adopted the Calf and were wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Although Moses had come to you with evidence of the truth, you chose the calf in his absence, and you transgressed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (More than that:) Moses came to you with clear Signs, yet no sooner was he away from you than you transgressed and took the calf for worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Moses) brought you certain miracles. Not very long after, you began worshipping the calf which was nothing but senseless cruelty to yourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Moosa came to you with clear signs, and after it you worshipped the calf – and you were unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed Musa came to you with clear proofs, yet you worshipped the calf after he left, and you were Zalimun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most certainly Musa came to you with clear arguments, then you took the calf (for a god) in his absence and you were unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Moses came to you with the clear signs, then you took to yourselves the Calf after him and you were evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Moses came unto you with clear proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty), yet, while he was away, ye chose the calf (for worship) and ye were wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses came to you with clear signs, but in his absence you worshipped the calf and became wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly Musa came unto you with evidence, then ye betook the calf after him, and ye were wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly Moses brought you manifest proofs, but then you took up the Calf in his absence and you were wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There came to you Moses with clear (Signs); yet ye worshipped the calf (Even) after that, and ye did behave wrongfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed Musa (Moses) came to you with clear proofs, yet you worshipped the calf after he left, and you were Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses came to you with clear signs, then you took to yourselves the calf after him and you were harmdoers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Moses came to you with clear proofs, yet you adopted the calf in his absence, and you were in the wrong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Moses had certainly brought you clear proofs. Then you took the calf [in worship] after that, while you were wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:92] And Moses came to you with clear proofs, miracles, such as the staff, his hand, and the parting of the sea; then you took to yourselves the calf, as a god, after him, after he had gone to the appointment, and you were evildoers, for taking it [in worship].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Moses came unto you with clear proofs) with commands, prohibitions and signs (yet while he was away ye chose the calf) you worshipped the calf (and ye were wrong-doers) unbelievers.
